DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the efficacy of dexamethasone added to ramosetron for preventing postoperative nausea and vomiting in highly susceptible patients following spine surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Dexamethasone Added to Ramosetron for Preventing Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting in Highly Susceptible Patients Following Spine Surgery
DOC.criteria: Females Ages 18 to 65 years old Patients who is taking steroid or who had been treated for the gastrointestinal disease Patients who have troubles with the kidney or liver Patients transferring to the ICU after the surgery overfat patients Patients who had taken antiemetics within 24 hours before the surgery
DOC.keyword: highly susceptible patients following spine surgery
